WRITING.TITLE: why was the clown sent to jail?
WRITING.TEXT: August 9th 1988 the childhood clown Tibbles was drinking on the job one day, he was tired of his dead end job. Evidence shows he drank half a bottle of Vodka. He approached a kid and said,"Do you waaannnt to see a magic rape, I mean trick?" The boy said yes without out knowing the clowns true intentions. The clown took the boy backstage, then picked up the boy, placed his hand behind the boys head and screamed,"HEY I FOUND A QUARTER IN YOUR EAR!" The boy laughed in joy then without hesitation the clown took a knife and stabbed the boy, on gta 5 multiplayer. Even though the clown never harmed the boy, he was arrested for drinking on the job and hoarding a barrel of cocaine in his showroom.
